Posts.Content: love-my-mom wrote: My mom has been diagnosed with Stage 4 advanced breast cancer (ER-/PR-/HER2-, liver, bone and lung mets) in March this year. She went through 6 rounds of AT - did a PET-CT after that and found out that her breast lump decreased in size to about half, but her liver/lungs mets increased! Onc recommended Xeloda - went through 1 round; a day after completion of Xeloda cycle, her bilirubin level went to 6.0, and 4 days after the completion of Xeloda cycle, went to 8.1! Her SGOT/SGPT/GGT are all very high! Dr stopped chemo treatment and is treating her symptomatically now. To all the stage 4 survivors with liver mets - any advice/suggestion what chemo treatment can still be given at this stage to check liver mets?Thank you so much!!! Dx 3/22/2010, DCIS, Stage IV, mets, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: High bilirubin in liver mets - options? love-my-mom Joannan

Posts.Content: Oct 5, 2010 09:18PM love-my-mom wrote: Darlene, thank you for the info on 5FU; I'll talk to Onc today about it! MCTHO, thanks for the info on theraspehere, though the info guide says it cannot be used with bilirubin >2! Does anyone use Carboplatin in this scenario?
Posts.Title: High bilirubin in liver mets - options? love-my-mom Joannan

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2010 02:29PM love-my-mom wrote: Thank you again for all your suggestions and advice! Unfortunately my mom is beyond treatment now - her condition deteriorated rapidly in a matter of 24 hours towards the end of last week, and she is with us no more!
Posts.Title: High bilirubin in liver mets - options? love-my-mom Joannan
